topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Bumps package to 1.5.15, adds zod as a peer dependency, and updates @elizaos/core to ^1.6.0-alpha.4.
> 
> - **Config**:
>   - Bump package version to `1.5.15` in `package.json`.
>   - Add `peerDependencies` for `zod` (`^3.25.76 || ^4.1.8`).
>   - Update dependency `@elizaos/core` to `^1.6.0-alpha.4`.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit dbd6703ded9d7709fb7a2489543e5b7cc09711a4. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Bumped app version to 1.5.15.
  * Updated core dependency to a newer pre-release, aligning with the latest platform improvements.
  * Added zod as a peer dependency to improve compatibility and reduce duplicate installations (supports 3.x and 4.x).
  
* **Notes**
  * No changes to public APIs or exported entities.
  * Users should ensure a compatible version of zod is installed in their environment.
